Bash(cd "C:\\Users\\bhawn\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\ExamForge\\backend" && ../venv/Scripts/python -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\('examforge.db'\)
c = conn.cursor\(\)
# Check if username column exists
c.execute\('PRAGMA table_info\(users\)'\)
cols = [row[1] for row in c.fetchall\(\)]
if 'username' not in cols:
    c.execute\('ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN username VARCHAR\(100\)'\)
    # Set username from email prefix for existing users
    c.execute\('SELECT id, email FROM users'\)
    for uid, email in c.fetchall\(\):
        uname = email.split\('@'\)[0]
        c.execute\('UPDATE users SET username = ? WHERE id = ?', \(uname, uid\)\)
    conn.commit\(\)
    print\('Column added and existing users updated'\)
else:
    print\('Column already exists'\)

c.execute\('SELECT id, email, username, full_name FROM users'\)
for row in c.fetchall\(\):
    print\(row\)
conn.close\(\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd "C:\\Users\\bhawn\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\ExamForge" && source venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "
import google.generativeai as genai
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings\('ignore'\)

genai.configure\(api_key='AIzaSyBa5h_f-PmuL_LP8-Ib6NP4ZO0RhN0pzf4'\)

for model_name in ['gemini-2.5-flash', 'gemini-2.5-pro', 'gemini-2.0-flash']:
    try:
        model = genai.GenerativeModel\(model_name\)
        response = model.generate_content\('Say hi in one word'\)
        print\(f'{model_name}: OK - {response.text.strip\(\)}'\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f'{model_name}: FAIL - {type\(e\).__name__}'\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(cd "C:\\Users\\bhawn\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\ExamForge\\backend" && source ../venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "
from app.database import SyncSessionLocal
from app.models import GeneratedPaper, UploadedPaper

session = SyncSessionLocal\(\)

# Check generated papers
papers = session.query\(GeneratedPaper\).order_by\(GeneratedPaper.id.desc\(\)\).limit\(3\).all\(\)
for p in papers:
    print\(f'GeneratedPaper #{p.id}: status={p.status}, error={p.error_message}'\)

# Check uploaded papers
uploads = session.query\(UploadedPaper\).order_by\(UploadedPaper.id.desc\(\)\).limit\(3\).all\(\)
for u in uploads:
    print\(f'UploadedPaper #{u.id}: status={u.status}, error={u.error_message}'\)

session.close\(\)
" 2>&1)
